activities: The core business of CFOknows is spend analysis.  CFOknows receives accounts payable payment data from its customers.  The vast majority of data received is a customer’s spend with external suppliers and does not include personally identifying data.  However, a small amount of data received may include personally identifying data.  The data received is analyzed by CFOknows.  And the on-line analytical output created by CFOknows is used by customers to identify cost reduction opportunities in strategic sourcing, accounts payable and other areas.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
